TITLE: Authenticating and Querying Shopify Data in Remix
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to authenticate with Shopify admin and query products data using GraphQL in a Remix loader function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/shopify/shopify-app-template-remix/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: js
CODE:
```
export async function loader({ request }) {
  const { admin } = await shopify.authenticate.admin(request);

  const response = await admin.graphql(`
    {
      products(first: 25) {
        nodes {
          title
          description
        }
      }
    }`);

  const {
    data: {
      products: { nodes },
    },
  } = await response.json();

  return nodes;
}
```

TITLE: Configuring Prisma Schema for MongoDB in Shopify Remix App
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to properly configure a Prisma schema for MongoDB integration by mapping the MongoDB _id field to the session_id field and ensuring proper ID field configuration for compatibility with Shopify's session storage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/shopify/shopify-app-template-remix/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: prisma
CODE:
```
model Session {
  session_id  String    @id @default(auto()) @map("_id") @db.ObjectId
  id          String    @unique
...
}
```

TITLE: Configuring MongoDB Database Commands in shopify.web.toml
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to modify the shopify.web.toml configuration to use Prisma with MongoDB, replacing migrate commands with db push commands since MongoDB doesn't support Prisma migrate.
SOURCE: https://github.com/shopify/shopify-app-template-remix/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
[commands]
predev = "npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push"
dev = "npm exec remix vite:dev"
```

TITLE: Configuring Vite for Vercel Hosting
DESCRIPTION: Vite configuration diff showing the changes needed to host a Shopify Remix app on Vercel by adding the Vercel preset.
SOURCE: https://github.com/shopify/shopify-app-template-remix/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
// vite.config.ts
import { vitePlugin as remix } from "@remix-run/dev";
import { defineConfig, type UserConfig } from "vite";
import tsconfigPaths from "vite-tsconfig-paths";
+ import { vercelPreset } from '@vercel/remix/vite';

installGlobals();

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    remix({
      ignoredRouteFiles: ["**/.*"],
+     presets: [vercelPreset()],
    }),
    tsconfigPaths(),
  ],
});
```
